BIO

I am a telecommunications engineering student at ESPRIT, currently looking for an end of studies internship. I am fascinated by the world of telecommunications and how it changed our world, at the same time, I love the logic and structure of coding and building new applications.
When I am not coding, you will find me playing video games or in the chess club.
